text: He resurrected the other. The one lost to the lightning abortionist; the one who left her yellow as wax and him pale as the murderer and with a mouth more submerged than ever. He resurrected now, when already in marriage it was more entertaining to have a child, and they had thought that it would unite them in the terrible disunity that reigned between them. Although they vaguely remembered that child almost alive they killed, so beautiful, with that joy on the face of the children of free love, it was immediately noticeable that this one had the same factions. It was the other one coming back. He got back at himself for being killed and he was crying all the time. They were scared. How would I look at them when I could recognize them?
title: La vuelta del otro
author: Ramón Gómez de la Serna
